black.$description: Base color for different text opacities. Used as a mixer in the mid theming layer for hover states, active states etc. Dividers and table headers. Base color for secondary, Tertiary and Subtle buttons. Base color for Input borders. Focus internal border.

white.$description: Surface backgrounds. Text colors on buttons and on dark backgrounds. Used as a mixer in the mid theming layer for hover states, active states etc.

50.$description: Sage Logo color Primary buttons on dark backgrounds

45.$description: Primary buttons on light backgrounds. Was #008047 Jade. Luminosity 46.8.

55.$description: Base status color for dark surfaces. AA text  on dark. Luminosity 51.9.

45.$description: Base status color for light surface. AA text on white. Not taken from brand portal as previous orange wasn't accessible.

55.$description: Base status color for dark surfaces. AA text  on dark. Luminosity 51.9.

45.$description: Base status color for light surface. AA text on white. Luminosity 46.8.

55.$description: Base status color for dark surfaces. AA text  on dark. Luminosity 51.9.

45.$description: Base status color for light surface. AA text on white. Color taken from brand portal.

55.$description: Base status color for dark surfaces. AA text  on dark. Luminosity 51.9.

45.$description: Alternative colour with no semantic meaning. Used in progress tracker on light. Luminosity 46.8.

55.$description: Alternative colour with no semantic meaning. Used in progress tracker on dark. Luminosity 51.9

45.$description: Base status color for light surface. AAA text on white.

55.$description: Base status color for dark surfaces. AA text  on dark. Luminosity 51.9.

SCALE.$description: SCALE is the base-scale of all size-related tokens (size, space, dimension). It's set to 8px as this is our default multiplier used across the majority of components. If you change it, it will change all size-related tokens.

300.$description: For components where space is tight

component.$description: Used in componentry such as tables, buttons, inputs etc.

other.$description: Fallback for when Sage fonts cannot load.
